name: youtube-data-api
description: YouTube Data API interaction skill. Search videos, retrieve video and channel details, list comments, get trending videos, browse playlists, and list channel videos. Layer 1 skill using provider client for API access.
author: claw2agent

toolDefinition.name: youtube_data_api
toolDefinition.description: Search YouTube videos, get video and channel details, list comments, get trending videos, browse playlists, and list channel videos. Layer 1 skill using provider client for API access (BYOK).

action.description: search_videos (search for videos), get_video (get video details), get_channel (get channel details), get_comments (get video comments), get_trending (get trending videos), get_playlist (get playlist items), get_channel_videos (list channel's videos)

query.description: Search query string. Required for search_videos. Max 500 characters.

videoId.description: YouTube video ID. Required for get_video and get_comments.

channelId.description: YouTube channel ID. Required for get_channel and get_channel_videos.

playlistId.description: YouTube playlist ID. Required for get_playlist.

order.description: Sort order. For search_videos: relevance|date|viewCount|rating (default: relevance). For get_comments: time|relevance (default: relevance). For get_channel_videos: date|viewCount (default: date).

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return. For search_videos/get_playlist/get_channel_videos: 1-50 (default: 25). For get_comments: 1-100 (default: 25).

category.description: Video category filter. Optional for get_trending.

region.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 region code. Optional for get_trending (default: US).
